body:
Comment 6: 
This has annoyed me in the past, and I just tried again and it still took me several
seconds and scrolls up and down the page to find "Visit the Go project's downloads
page". Really, after clicking on "Download Go", I would like to see links to actual
downloads right away. If I wanted installation instructions, I would have gone looking
for installation instructions, and never clicked on "Download Go" in the first place.
